title: I drew a Poro for 1RP, I was told this was the way to go?

embed.description: Post anything (from anywhere!), customize everything, and find and follow what you love. Create your own Tumblr blog today.

body: I drew a Poro for (Hopefully) 1RP to get Star-Gaurdian Ezreal from my snowdown shop. He's meant to be abit windswept since cold winter air and all that, but he remains a cheery fellow as shown by his cheeky smile... I like him o3o

replies.body: **I LOVE THIS PORO**!  It is the hippest *coolest* poro I've seen!  Do you think he would be my friend?  >< You may find that RP on your account, friend.  Thanks for the drawing and stay cheeky!  :D
I think he'd definately be your friend ^-^ He's a -chill- guy ;D Thank yewww, i might do more, it was actually kinda fun ^-^
PLEASE SEND MORE ADORABLE POROS!!! SUPPLIES ARE RUNNING SHORT
